level.heading: Electronic records and signatures.
level.text: The provisions of this chapter governing the legal effect, validity, or enforceability of electronic records or electronic signatures, and of contracts formed or performed with the use of such records or signatures, conform to the requirements of section 102 of the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 467; 15 U.S.C. ยง 7002), and supersede, modify, and limit the requirements of the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-104, see notes following ยง 19-1301.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 1102 of the Uniform Trust Code. See 7C, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
